Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People across the country are buzzing in anticipation of the 2023 federal budget announcement. As the government works to prioritize cost-of-living relief initiatives for struggling families others are discussing the possible impacts of taxation changes on different industries. Louise Bilardo from the NT Road Transport Association raised concerns about the transport industry's ongoing revenue loss while Dr. Diane Crowell anticipates Inpex petroleum company's obligation to start paying rent tax. As people eagerly await further details on the budget they don't want to miss out on expert analysis and discussions offered on ABC Local Radio.
